body_html:
Ok, I got it to work. If it is of use to anyone, I added to the CROSSTOOL file the following lines. At line 99, after compiler_flag: "-fPIE":

compiler_flag: "-I/home/rocha/.local/include"

And at line 126, after linker_flag: "-Wl,--hash-style=gnu":

linker_flag: "-L/home/rocha/.local/lib"
body_text:
Ok, I got it to work. If it is of use to anyone, I added to the CROSSTOOL file the following lines. At line 99, after compiler_flag: "-fPIE":
compiler_flag: "-I/home/rocha/.local/include"

And at line 126, after linker_flag: "-Wl,--hash-style=gnu":
linker_flag: "-L/home/rocha/.local/lib"
body:
Ok, I got it to work. If it is of use to anyone, I added to the CROSSTOOL file the following lines. At line 99, after `compiler_flag: "-fPIE"`:

```
compiler_flag: "-I/home/rocha/.local/include"
```

And at line 126, after `linker_flag: "-Wl,--hash-style=gnu"`:

```
linker_flag: "-L/home/rocha/.local/lib"
```
